title: Collaborating Across Private, Public, Community, and Federal Hospital Systems: Lessons Learned from the Covid-19 Pandemic Response in NYC
abstract: Despite the variation in organizational and financial structures, the four hospital systems were able to collaborate during the crisis, with particular focus on communication, surge capacity (beds, staff, and triage), clinical care, and staff wellness.
authors: Schaye, Verity E.; Reich, Jenna A.; Bosworth, Brian P.; Stern, David T.; Volpicelli, Frank; Shapiro, Neil M.; Hauck, Kevin D.; Fagan, Ian M.; Villagomez, Seagram M.; Uppal, Amit; Sauthoff, Harald; LoCurcio, Michael; Cocks, Patrick M.; Bails, Douglas B.
